long_description: The Marmot Rockaway 20degF sleeping bag offers extra width at the shoulder, waist and foot areas so you can stretch out. This roomy bag is great for chilly and damp car camping excursions. Insulation is a unique blend of 3-denier conjugated spiral hollow fibers and 1-denier polyester fibers that provide loft, warmth and compressibility. Overlapping shingle insulation construction throughout prevents cold spots. Polyester shell and lining fabrics are treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. Hood envelops your head in warmth; drawcords cinch face muff snug without digging into face. Zipper guard along draft tube keeps fabric from snagging in the coils; 2-way zippers. No more midnight drawcord fumbling-smooth, flat upper cord and hard, round lower cord make top opening adjustments easy. Trapezoid footbox is wide in toe area and narrow at the heels for comfort that does not compromise warmth. The Marmot Rockaway 20degF sleeping bag includes a compression stuff sack. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
